    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ResponseCallbackHandler getInstance()

      • writeRequested

        public void writeRequested(org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                  org.jboss.netty.channel.MessageEvent me)
        This method handles downstream message events. It adds a token to outgoing requests to enable the method messageReceived to relate incoming responses to requests.
        Overrides:
        writeRequested in class org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelHandler
        Parameters:
        ctx - The ChannelHandlerContext to relate this handler to the Channel
        me - The MessageEvent containing the CoapMessage

      • messageReceived

        public void messageReceived(org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                   org.jboss.netty.channel.MessageEvent me)
        This method relates incoming responses to open requests and invokes the method reveiveCoapResponse of the client that sent the response. CoaP clients thus should implement the ResponseCallback interface by extending the abstract class CoapClientApplication.
        Overrides:
        messageReceived in class org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelHandler
        Parameters:
        ctx - The ChannelHandlerContext to relate this handler to the Channel
        me - The MessageEvent containing the CoapMessage
